comments.body: Quote from: sabujdc on February 08, 2023, 06:15:03 PMProviding Amazon Reviews Votes.Price: Per Votes 0.70$Payment Method: BTC, PPDelivery: After getting details Within 24 to 48 Hours. Few times takes time for amazon to updatesRefund Policy: Full Refund If failing to Count the votesContact :telegram : https://t.me/sabujdcDo you not think that providing fake votes/reviews (without using their service) will encourage the buyer to scam by providing low quality product/service and the receive of the product/service will be misguided by those reviews? Also, don't you think that if there happened any scam/not provide the desired product/service then you will be responsible for providing fake reviews?
